Interface ITool

    All Known Subinterfaces:

    public interface ITool
extends java.io.Serializable
    Generic tool. This interface represents objects that perform a task in an evolutionary algorithm: individual selection, crossover or mutation operations, etc.
    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura
